description:
NTS Map: 082E14
Climb the gravel road for about 6km, staying right at forks. Some sections are steep, but it only takes 30-45min to get to where the gravel "road" ends at Flamingo Flats (faded pink flamingo stuck in ground at clearing in forest). Climb the singletrack going up and to the right. After a 4-5 minute climb, it's all downhill to the power station with lots of twisty singletrack and some fast sandy sections. There are many trail options on the way down - much fun to explore and all lead back to the power lines. (10-15km
directions: Follow Benvoulin Rd. South and take a left onto Casorso after the bridge. Take a left onto Bedford, which turns into Stewart Road East. Follow Stewart Road East until the pavement ends at a power station. Park and begin riding up the gravel road
title: Flamingo Flats
